comments.body: Did you drop the `final` for some reason in particular?

Yes, because I want to maintain the hierarchy for `store_ledger_entry` sub-metrics. For that I extended from `DatabaseMetrics` [here](https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/pull/6163/files#diff-c455b5ef86f3eac1e49aba3a837c4d95R337-R354).
